about.title: About Us
about.text1: The BringMeHome team was founded to help every cat find a loving home. Every day we work to ensure that cats in shelters grow up safe, cared for, and loved. We believe that every cat deserves attention, playful moments, and peaceful rest.
about.text2: Our shelter is not just a temporary home, but a community where cats can experience human affection, and adopters can experience the loyalty and love of their new pets. We organize programs that support adoption, socialization, and responsible pet ownership.
about.text3: Our goal is for every cat, dog, or small companion animal to live happily in a loving family. We believe in the power of community and that together we can make shelter life better for every cat.

comments.title: Said About Us
comments.pov1: I love that every cat finds such a loving home here.
comments.pov2: The team is incredibly kind, and the cats are always happy.
comments.pov3: This shelter truly gives every cat a home.

adopt.title: Adopt a Cat

cat1.name: Csipesz
cat1.character: Curious and confident, but reserved in unfamiliar situations. Intelligent and alert.
cat1.special_features: Bright green eyes and a long, elegant mustache.

cat2.name: Karamell
cat2.character: Friendly and playful, loves to be the center of attention. Adapts quickly to new environments.
cat2.special_features: Distinctive, tricolored coat (with white, black, and reddish-brown patches), and beautiful, amber-colored eyes.

cat3.name: Nokedli
cat3.character: Calm, friendly, and well-balanced. A reliable and kind companion.
cat3.special_features: Unique light green eyes and a coat that also hides darker patches, which are also found on his paws.

cat4.name: Tébláb
cat4.character: Easy to befriend, loves belly rubs. Enjoys sleeping next to his owner.
cat4.special_features: Short legs and a long tail.

cat5.name: Snow
cat5.character: A bit of a wild child, but very affectionate. Loves being with her owner.
cat5.special_features: Wonderful, bright blue eyes and soft, cream-colored fur with darker patches on her face and ears.

cat6.name: Marci
cat6.character: Calm and confident, a true ruler type. He has a strong and balanced personality and enjoys attention.
cat6.special_features: A distinctive dark brown tabby coat, muscular build, and amber-colored eyes.

cat7.name: Démon
cat7.character: Loves being with his owner, loves to cuddle. Very patient.
cat7.special_features: Jet-black, shiny fur and green eyes that stand out brightly against his dark coat.

cat8.name: Tódor
cat8.character: The nickname 'gentle giant' fits him perfectly. Calm, friendly, and extremely affectionate.
cat8.special_features: Huge, bushy fur, tufts of hair at the tips of his ears, and a majestic stance.

adopt.para1: These cats came to us with special stories: some are shy and gentle, others are true clowns - but they are all ready for a loving home.
adopt.para2: Adoption is a long-term commitment, but in return, you get unconditional love. Look around the gallery and find a companion for yourself!

adopters.title: Our Adopters

story1.title: The beginning of a great adventure
story1.text: The family had always dreamed of a cat, and when they saw Fluffy, they instantly knew he was the perfect choice. The little cat immediately stole their hearts, and since then, every day of the family is filled with play and laughter. Fluffy found a real home, and the family was happy to give him a second chance.

story2.title: The healing of a lonely heart
story2.text: Bella, the calm and quiet cat, lived alone for a while until she found her new owner, an elderly lady. A bond was formed between them instantly. Bella brought peace to the home, and her owner expresses her gratitude for being able to give her a warm home.

adopters.cta-title: Are you ready for an adventure like this?

questions.question: #2 What is the adoption fee, and what does it cover (vaccinations, microchip, spay/neuter, deworming)?
questions.answer: #2 Attention: Answer is fictional with made up information. Adoption cost is 100$. Paid at the cat rescue center. Covers Vaccinations, microchip, spay/neuter, deworming.

questions.question: #3 Are the cats suitable for homes with children or other pets, and how should we do introductions?
questions.answer: #3 Attention: Answer is fictional with made up information. Stray cats tend not to trust at first. Please pay close attention when they first interact with other pets or children.

questions.question: #4 Do you offer a trial or foster-to-adopt period, and what’s your return policy if it isn’t a good match?
questions.answer: #4 Attention: Answer is fictional with made up information. We have a two week return policy. If a cat is not able to fit in even after two weeks, naturally we will search for a new place for them.

questions.question: #5 How should I prepare my home before bringing a cat home?
questions.answer: #5 Attention: Answer is fictional with made up information. At first prepare small portion of some brand of dry and wet food. The cats will need both and also fresh water.

catsPage.title: Adoptable Cats
catsPage.intro: On this page, we introduce our adoptable cats, where you can get to know their stories and personalities.
catsPage.finalCtaTitle: Are you ready for such an adventure?
catsPage.story-csipesz: Csipesz is a true explorer who once lived on the edge of the village, in an abandoned hut. His past is a bit wild, but discovering human affection awakened his sense of attachment.
catsPage.story-karamell: Karamell has had a sad fate, but he is an incredibly cheerful little boy. A driver found him in the rain by the roadside. He loves belly rubs and immediately opens his heart to everyone.

catsPage.title: Adoptable Cats
catsPage.intro: On this page, you can meet our adoptable cats, learn about their stories and personalities. Give a saved animal a loving home!
catsPage.finalCtaTitle: Ready for this kind of adventure?
catsPage.story-csipesz: Csipesz is a true explorer, who used to live in an abandoned shack on the edge of the village. His past was a little wild, but discovering human affection awakened his deep attachment. He is highly recommended for families with children.
catsPage.story-karamell: Karamell is a boy with a sad history but an incredibly cheerful spirit. He was found by a driver on the main road in the rain. He loves belly rubs and immediately takes everyone to his heart. He gets along well with other cats.
catsPage.story-cica3: Bundás is a calm, aging cat lady who is one of the wisest residents of the shelter. She loves sunbathing and lying on a heated cushion for hours. She is an ideal companion for a quiet household.
catsPage.story-cica4: Mici is an eternally energetic little black devil, always looking for some kind of adventure. She is extremely intelligent and a fast learner. It's important that she is surrounded by plenty of toys and a stimulating environment.
catsPage.story-cica5: Tigris, as his name suggests, was a real fighter on the streets, but at the shelter, he revealed his cuddly side. After a long period of warming up, he opens up and becomes a loyal, affectionate companion.
catsPage.story-cica6: Hópehely is a long-haired, elegant cat who loves being brushed and pampered. She is slightly shy, so she seeks a quiet home without small children.
catsPage.story-cica7: Füles is a friendly red male cat brought in by a local fisherman. He highly needs human attention and petting. He doesn't like being alone; if you are often away, having a cat companion is a good idea.
catsPage.story-cica8: Villám is a young and energetic female cat, whose every muscle is made for playing and running. She would be best in a place with a secure, cat-proof yard.
catsPage.story-cica9: Riska is a gentle, spotted female cat who was left in a box outside the shelter door. Although hesitant at first, she quickly gets used to her new home. She is a great companion for older people.
catsPage.story-cica10: Peti is a true little artist soul who likes to be in high places and observe the world from above. He hardly ever meows, he's quiet and thoughtful.
catsPage.story-cica11: Lola is an extremely cuddly black girl who demands the proximity of her owner every night. A true 'velcro cat' for whom love is the most important thing.
catsPage.story-cica12: Max is a gray-and-white, large male cat who loves his belly and treats. He is a bit lazy, but when he's in the mood, he'll play with a feather wand.
